name: Fossil Group, Inc.
description: Fossil Group, Inc. is a global design, marketing, and distribution company that specializes in lifestyle accessories, including watches, handbags, and jewelry. Founded in 1984 by Tom Kartsotis, Fossil has established itself as a prominent player in the fashion industry by combining innovation with a vintage aesthetic. The company offers a diverse range of products under its own brand as well as licensed brands, including Michael Kors, Diesel, and Armani Exchange. Fossil is particularly known for its fashionable watches, which blend traditional craftsmanship with modern technology, including smartwatches that integrate fitness tracking and smartphone notifications. In addition to its flagship Fossil brand, the company has expanded its offerings to include connected devices and wearables, reflecting its commitment to merging fashion with technology. With a dedication to sustainability, Fossil aims to reduce its environmental impact by implementing responsible practices in its supply chain and product development. As a publicly traded company, Fossil Group continues to innovate in the competitive accessories market while maintaining its focus on quality and style.
